commit.message:
ip2k.c (is_regfile_address): Use SYMBOL_REF_FUNCTION_P.

        * config/ip2k/ip2k.c (is_regfile_address): Use SYMBOL_REF_FUNCTION_P.
        (encode_section_info): Remove.
        * config/ip2k/ip2k-protos.h: Update.

From-SVN: r65730

files.patch:
